desc: Includes all concept ids that have a transitive is-a relationship with the concept Id provided as the value, including the provided concept itself (i.e. include child codes)

name: $is-a
desc: Includes all concept ids that have a transitive is-a relationship with the concept Id provided as the value, excluding the provided concept itself (i.e. include child codes)

name: $descendent-of
desc: The specified property of the code does not have an is-a relationship with the provided value.

name: $is-not-a
desc: The specified property of the code  matches the regex specified in the provided value.

name: $regex
desc: The specified property of the code is in the set of codes or concepts specified in the provided value (comma separated list).

name: $in
desc: The specified property of the code is not in the set of codes or concepts specified in the provided value (comma separated list).

name: $not-in
desc: Includes all concept ids that have a transitive is-a relationship from the concept Id provided as the value, including the provided concept itself (e.g. include parent codes)

name: $generalizes
desc: The specified property of the code has at least one value (if the specified value is true; if the specified value is false, then matches when the specified property of the code has no values)
